@graph.name: Brownie Recipe - Preppy Kitchen
@graph.description: My best ever Brownie Recipe that comes together in one bowl in just a few minutes. Rich, fudgy, and gooey and loaded with chocolate chips.

@graph.name: Brownie Recipe
@graph.description: How to make the most delicious homemade brownies from scratch. Rich, fudgy and delicious! Don't forget to check out my step by step photos and tips above (video below).

video.name: Fudgy Chocolate Brownies Recipe
video.description:
This fudgy and delicious chocolate brownie recipe comes together with one bowl in just a few minutes! You’ll love the flavor and texture so be forewarned, it’s best to invite some friends over when you make a batch because portion control is quite difficult around them.

Full Recipe: https://preppykitchen.com/brownie-recipe/

Homemade brownies are so easy and quick, there's no reason to make them from a box!

SUBSCRIBE ►https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTvYEid8tmg0jqGPDkehc_Q?sub_confirmation=1

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and prep a 8x8-inch baking pan with parchment paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F and prep a 8x8-inch baking pan with parchment paper.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine melted butter, eggs, vanilla extract, and coffee then mix together well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine melted butter, eggs, vanilla extract, and coffee then mix together well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the white and brown sugars to the mixture and whisk together well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the white and brown sugars to the mixture and whisk together well.

recipeInstructions.text: Sift cocoa powder, flour, and salt into the bowl and mix until just combined
recipeInstructions.name: Sift cocoa powder, flour, and salt into the bowl and mix until just combined

recipeInstructions.text: Toss in chocolate chips (or chunks) and fold into the batter.
recipeInstructions.name: Toss in chocolate chips (or chunks) and fold into the batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Add batter to pan and smooth to the edges. You can add more chocolate chips to the top before baking if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Add batter to pan and smooth to the edges. You can add more chocolate chips to the top before baking if desired.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for about 30 minutes or until the center is just set. You'll notice the center does not wiggle when the pan is moved.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for about 30 minutes or until the center is just set. You'll notice the center does not wiggle when the pan is moved.
